docs.title: Triangle-of-Means Recurrence (Draft)
docs.text:
Put equations (X_t, Y_t, a_t, b_t, c_t), rotation/phase, and coherence loss here.

Inline math test: \( a^2 + b^2 = c^2 \)

Block math test:

\[ H_t = g\!\left(R_{\Delta \phi_t}(z_t), H_{t-1}\right) \]
